experiment_name: Enantioselective Single and Dual α-C-H Bond Functionalization of Cyclic Amines via Enzymatic Carbene Transfer
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:room temperature;    reaction_ph:7.0;    reaction_other_conditions:CYP119 variants expressed in E. coli C41(DE3) cells (OD600 = 40), 10 mM Na2S2O4 (sodium dithionite), 16 hours, anaerobic chamber;    reaction_substrate_concentration:10 mM 1-phenylpyrrolidine (2a), 20 mM 1-diazopropan-2-one (1a)
